# Tabs

## Rules

| Type            | Rule                                            |
| --------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| **Purpose**     | Organize content in tabs                        |
| **Quantity**    | limited by width (overflowing tabs are hidden!) |

## Simplified usage examples

```
<TabBar>
  <Tab>Tab1</Tab>
  <Tab>Tab2</Tab>
</TabBar>
<TabContent>Tab1 Content</TabContent>
<TabContent>Tab2 Content</TabContent>
```
